highlights: Developed a complete email/password authentication flow in a React application using Firebase Authentication, supporting user signup, login, logout, and secure session handling.
Implemented real-time authentication state management via custom hooks and listeners to synchronize UI state with Firebase auth events across the application.
Integrated Firestore as a NoSQL backend to persist and retrieve user profile data, separating authentication concerns from application data storage.
Designed a modular project architecture with reusable authentication utilities and optional Redux-based user state management to improve maintainability and scalability.
